\name{Rim.Protector}
\alias{Rim.Protector}
\title{Rim.Protector}
\usage{
Rim.Protector <- (PLAYER_NAME, BLK_x)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{BLK_x}{Players average blocks per game}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to generate blocks
}
\examples{
Rim.Protector("Lebron James", 2.1)
}
